original_text: It can easily break iron or bronze weapons. It breaks them as easily as grass or soft wood. It can easily break iron or bronze weapons. It breaks them as easily as grass or soft wood. korean_text: 그것이 쇠를 지푸라기 같이, 놋을 썩은 나무 같이 여기니

sentences.original_text: It can easily break iron or bronze weapons.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 쉽게 철이나 청동 무기를 부술 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: It breaks them as easily as grass or soft wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 풀이나 부드러운 나무처럼 쉽게 그것들을 부숩니다.
